The image shows a tropical cyclone advisory, which is a bulletin issued by the National Hurricane Center in Miami, Florida. This particular advisory pertains to a system known as Potential Tropical Cyclone Nine, which is forecast to move inland over south Texas early on Tuesday, August 21, 2023.

The advisory also mentions that heavy rainfall is expected in southern Texas on Tuesday and Wednesday, which could lead to flash and urban flooding.
